nodes.text: A weaver was an artistic endeavor. Many such artists worked on the planet Naboo. Before her recruitment as a Handmaiden in 32 BBY, Yané worked a loom to make blankets for a hospital, and kept that skill to carry secrets during the Invasion of Naboo.
Weavers appear in the 2020 novel Queen's Peril, written by E. K. Johnston.
